name: Meme Creation
description:
Try to create the most epic meme of all time!

Meme Creation let's you experience the life of an epic meme lord. Live through him and create the most based meme you've ever created. But will it be understood by all the other memsters in the world so that it can go viral?

This masterpiece was made by me!

Meme Creation is a Game Jam project made during the Game Changers Game Jam 2020:  https://itch.io/jam/gamechanger-game-jam-2020 . The game was made in Unity by myself during the 30 hours. Hope you enjoy this silly game!

Background Music: Stage 1 by Sawsquarenoise

Wobbly text code by: Madalaski on YouTube.

Art assets by myself.
